define: Use this api to end shop discount activity

error_list.name: discount.discount_not_ongoing
error_list.description: The ongoing discount cannot be deleted.

error_list.name: discount.end_discount_time_error
error_list.description: Only can end the discount after 1 hour of start time.

error_list.name: discount.discount_is_ongoing
error_list.description: Only the ongoing discount can be ended.

error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.description: There is no sign in query.
